title: How are you dealing with the Covid situation? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question we all have to ask ourselves; great question. It’s been a hard adjustment to say the least! I feel sadly for those who are suffering most. For me, I work part time from home so the adjustments aren’t bad. Now that we can get out, it’s wonderful with social distancing with family and friends. I think like anything in life, we have to go with the flow and make things work. Eating healthy, exercising and getting plenty of rest during this time is essential. I try not to watch a lot of news, as I feel that may be unhealthy; we can get overwhelmed with too much information. Wishing you the best in this phase of all of our lives!
